channel.title: GCP FortiDevSec TEC workshop on Hugo web framework for Fortinet Demos
channel.description: Recent content in GCP FortiDevSec TEC workshop on Hugo web framework for Fortinet Demos

item.title: Get (git) Ready
item.description: LAB 1 - Get (git) Ready This lab will take you through the process of creating a User Token for Github and then a few other administrative tasks to prepare the environment. More advanced users, already familiar with Github, can just use the link from Task 2 below to fork the repository and then move on to LAB 2.

item.title: Onboard Application
item.description: In this lab, we will onboard your new application into FortiDevSec. We will also update your repository so that Github Actions will kick off a FortiDevSec application scan upon successful git pull or git push. This is separated into it’s own lab to highlight how simple the process is.

item.title: Ch 3 - Break stuff (and fix it)
item.description: Now that we have successfully onboarded our application into FortiDevSec, we will go take a look at the findings from the first scan as well as add a few bits of code to cause new errors.
